Description: Position Title:         Office AdminEmployment Type: Full-timeSalary:         up to 6K AED, all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:         Dubai, UAEAbout the Client: A global leader in technology-driven solutions for defense, engineering, and innovation.Job Description:  Preparing, organising, and storing information in paper and digital form. Managing diary and arranging appointments, booking meeting rooms and conference facilities  Overseeing administrative tasks such as encoding of letters and reports, printing and photocopying and phone management. Tracking office supplies inventory and placing orders when necessary. Liaising with suppliers and contractors with other departments (Finance, HR, etc.)Skills
Skills:  At least 3 years of experience in the similar role
 Excellent knowledge of MS Office and office management software
